overview:
Dongxia Liu is the CTO and Co-Founder of Trademarkia.com and a co-founder of EatBid.com.

Trademarkia was a TechCrunch50 2009 Demo Pit company. Trademarkia is a visual search engine for brands, logos, and government data. It has grown to become one of the most successful companies in the legal information space, now driving nearly 3 million page views per month and on track to surpass more than $10 million dollars in revenue in 2011. It has achieved this with no venture funding.

EatBid is a new stealth-mode startup that hopes to make itâ€™s launch at TechCrunch Disrupt 2011.

Prior to these ventures, Dongxia Liu was the founding VP of Engineering for at Cafe Press (formerly ImageKind), a large eCommerce website. Cafepress.com allows its users to independently create and sell a wide variety of products on the web. By allowing individual sellers to set up free â€œshopsâ€ within their domain, Cafepress makes it easy for artists and designers to sell their goods online.

Dongxia holds an M.S. in Information Systems with high honors from Utah State University.
